children: Evaluation of chronic cough. UACS = upper airway cough syndrome.

footnotes: Recommendations from Irwin RS, French CL, Chang AB, et al; CHEST Expert Cough Panel. Classification of cough as a symptom in adults and management algorithms: CHEST guideline and expert panel report. Chest. 2018;153:196-209.
